text:
Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL), Vellore, in coordination with the Taluk Legal Services Committee, Ranipet, is conducting a Lok Adalat to realise the telephone dues from defaulters in Ranipet and connected areas on January 30.

According to a press release, the committee will review the defaulter cases of landline and WLL to settle the outstanding dues mutually to avoid further legal action.

Defaulters, who have been summoned, and others with any dispute can avail of this final opportunity and attend the Lok Adalat to settle their cases. Defaulters have been asked to come prepared for spot payment/settlement.

The Lok Adalat will be conducted at the Taluk Legal Services Committee, 3rd floor, Combined Court, Ranipet from 10 a.m., the release said. — Staff Reporter
title: BSNL Lok Adalat on January 30
